name: SetSetting: Everything Goes
description:
SetSetting  Everything Goe is the early access version of the game. A 2d fighting game with casual combat but with spin: instead of a jump, you get to reverse positions with your opponent with a simple move

 Story:

  Ray heard her entire life about the fighting history of Teresa Januario,  A Boxer from the 1800s.  When she visits her in their new home in the Amazon region, she makes a stunning discovery. Her favorite boxer is now blind and lives alone in a rented house.
